message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a fair split!
Your turn to be reasonable, Alice.  How about a 55/45 split?
I can do 58-42, but that's as low as I'll go!
This is getting ridiculous, Alice.  I'm losing money fast! 52/48 is my final offer.
You're running out of time, Bob! 57-43 is my new offer.
